t.p: I want to bring my knowledge into practice. I want to develop some practical skills and also to get some experience that would help me after graduation. I want to work in MARI PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED.

div.p: Root cause analysis of the repetitive mechanical seal failure of an acid regeneration pump; Development of a replacement procedure for a sodium hypochlorite unloading pump: Investigating problems in dosing pumps at assigned area and recommend solutions.

Investigated the process of making and repairing dyes, injection molding, blow molding, extrusion, welding, metal operations, and thermoforming. • Checked the implementation of 5S and quality assurance of products (Unilever ice cream packages and shamp
Executed update and redesign of the Electrical Distribution from the Power House to the entire production plant. Gained experience with Industrial Instrumentation, automation and design standards.
